title: Forbidden
description: For the last three years, Imogen Myers has been Professor Grey Thompson's brightest student. That is until Imogen starts working the night shift at a local bar after her Father refuses to pay any more of her tuition fees. As a result, Imogen finds juggling University and work a struggle, and her grades begin to fall.Being the strict Professor he is Grey doesn't tolerate his students failing his classes. The final straw comes when Imogen falls asleep in one of his lectures!Grey sees an opportunity to help Imogen with her financial and academic difficulties; by offering her a live-in job cleaning for him after university. In return, he will help Imogen with her university work.The problem is Imogen is completely smitten with Grey, and this intensifies when she moves in with him. But when Grey is accused with Imogen's rape, their lives will be changed forever!Trigger warning! Contains a graphic rape scene.
author: J.L. Grice
